SELECT
d.prop_name ApplicantName, '0' type,
d.prop_name beApplicantName, '1' type,
a.status stauts, a.content content, a.arbitrator_content arbitratorContent, a.create_time createtime FROM adjudication_amendment_record a
LEFT JOIN case_proposer d ON d.case_id =a.case_id
LEFT JOIN case_defendant d ON d.case_id =a.case_id
LEFT JOIN case_agent e ON e.case_id =a.case_id LEFT JOIN litigant_info b ON a.content_id=b.user_id LEFT JOIN litigant_agent c ON c.litigant_id =b.id LEFT JOIN case_request_info f ON f.case_id=a.case_id WHERE a.case_id=#{caseId} AND e.litigant_type=#{litigantType} AND e.agent_id=c.agent_id AND f.request_type=#{requestFlag} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
